message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you, and I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product right now, I can tell you that it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1750000. This price reflects the potential value of this product and the opportunity for us to establish a mutually beneficial relationship. Let me know your thoughts, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
